Plugin Documentation

Goals available for this plugin:

GoalDescription
couchdb:attach-artifactsAttaches packaged couchapps to the current project.
couchdb:compile-jsCompress the JavaScript used for view / show etc. functions.
couchdb:compress-artifactsPackages a couchapp in preparation for deployment to couch db or an artifact repository.
couchdb:expand-includesExpands include (!code [FILE]) comments in couch app files
couchdb:get-documentStandalone goal which gets a document from Couch DB
couchdb:helpDisplay help information on couchdb-maven-plugin.
Call 
  mvn couchdb:help -Ddetail=true -Dgoal=<goal-name>
to display parameter details.
couchdb:packagePackages a couchapp in preparation for deployment to couch db or an artifact repository.
couchdb:pushStandalone goal which pushes one or more couch apps to Couch DB

System Requirements

The following specifies the minimum requirements to run this Maven plugin:

Maven2.0
JDKDefault target for maven-compiler-plugin version 2.3.2
MemoryNo minimum requirement.
Disk SpaceNo minimum requirement.

Usage

You should specify the version in your project's plugin configuration:

<project>
  ...
  <build>
    <!-- To define the plugin version in your parent POM -->
    <pluginManagement>
      <plugins>
        <plugin>
          <groupId>org.dthume.couchdb</groupId>
          <artifactId>couchdb-maven-plugin</artifactId>
          <version>0.2-SNAPSHOT</version>
        </plugin>
        ...
      </plugins>
    </pluginManagement>
    <!-- To use the plugin goals in your POM or parent POM -->
    <plugins>
      <plugin>
        <groupId>org.dthume.couchdb</groupId>
        <artifactId>couchdb-maven-plugin</artifactId>
        <version>0.2-SNAPSHOT</version>
      </plugin>
      ...
    </plugins>
  </build>
  ...
</project>

For more information, see "Guide to Configuring Plug-ins"
